ygData.subject: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: I am pretty new to this list and I am sorry if this has been asked before but I am a VERY new tailor/smith and I am wondering at about what skill does it take
ygData.messageBody:
I am pretty new to this list and I am sorry if this has been asked before but
I am a VERY new tailor/smith and I am wondering at about what skill does it
take to become pretty good at making the studs I need for studded armor? And
if you could also help me I am wondering what ingredients it takes to make
those studs?

and once again I am very sorry if you all have heard this questions a hundred
times

new smith,

-Rojer
